title: Add ticks-code component
description:
Code/monospace text display component.

Features:
- Monospace font (Geist Mono)
- Optional copy button
- Optional syntax highlighting (stretch)
- Inline and block variants

Usage:
<ticks-code>npm install ticks</ticks-code>
<ticks-code block copyable>
export TICKS_TOKEN=your-token-here
tk run --cloud
</ticks-code>
acceptance_criteria: Component renders correctly in preview page with copy functionality
